lyrics.text:
’Eiki Sīsū ko koe pē,
Ko hoku tokoni;
‘I he’eku mafasia,
‘I he anga kovi.

Pea ‘oku puna hake,
Hoku laumālie;
Ki he ‘Afiona ‘Eiki,
Pea u tui loto.

Ko e tu’utāmaki au,
Pea u houhau’ia;
Ka ‘oku ou unga atu,
Ki he ta’ata’a.

Pea ‘i he’eku tui,
‘Oku ou ongo’i,
‘A e tokoni mo’oni,
Fakalaumālie.

Pea u fiemālie ai,
‘I he’eku tui;
Pea u hangahanga fai pē
Pea u mo’ui ai.
